title: 2Bd/2Ba *House* - No Fee - w/d in unit - Avail 9/1 - Dog ok
posting_body: Your own private, single family house in East Boston!
- Spacious bedrooms with plenty of closet space, and basement storage
- Private front patio with charming blue fir, perfect for grilling and summer entertaining
- Modern finishings and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, and built-in microwave
- Large eat-in kitchen with granite countertops and solid wood cabinets
- Large bathroom upstairs renovated this year, with second full bathroom on first floor
- Wood Island Blue Line T stop: 17 minutes door to door to Downtown
- Bright and open feel with great light and lots of sun
- Lots of shops, restaurants, and bars in the neighborhood
First, Last, Security and required before move in
* Small dogs ok (accepted on a case by case basis)
